dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: What a pleasant surprise! And just when I was beginning to fear we'd seen the last of good company for a spell.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yet the Eternal provides, does it not?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I certainly can't fault your optimism.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: If you're so eager for company, why live all the way out here?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I hope you're not gonna preach at me all through dinner.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: And who could? Stretch out your hand, and Cosmic Divinity reaches back. Open wide your mouth, and the universe provides sustenance.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Things have a way of working out, I suppose.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you mean by that?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Whatever. I don't have time for this.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: That they do. Though it's up to us to make the most of those opportunities, wouldn't you say?

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: Look at me, prattling on as if this gravy is going to cook itself. Why don't you run along until we're ready for dinner?

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: Just that your presence here is a gift to us, and one that we don't take for granted.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: I suppose not. I'll leave you be until dinner.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: The Eternal does not desire that we huddle and hide, crowded in by walls! We all share the spark of the divine, and we were made to spread it across the stars.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: Out here, we are free. And even apart from society, the universe provides for us, as your being here proves.

dialog.speaker: Martha (Female)
dialog.utterance: What tiresome company we'd be! Fear not on that account. Besides, I've always believed the Eternal reveals itself plain enough, as your being here proves.
